mapper.sql: odid, draft_eid, content, fid, title, nuclear_draft_eid, nuclear_draft_isApproved, nuclear_draft_opinion, issued_eid, issued_isApproved, issued_opinion, orderBy, createtime, updatetime
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM tb_official_document WHERE draft_eid = #{eid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by orderBy desc

SELECT
FROM tb_official_document WHERE nuclear_draft_eid = #{eid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and nuclear_draft_isApproved = 0 order by orderBy

SELECT
FROM tb_official_document WHERE nuclear_draft_eid = #{eid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and (nuclear_draft_isApproved = 1 or nuclear_draft_isApproved = -1) order by orderBy desc

SELECT
FROM tb_official_document WHERE issued_eid = #{eid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and issued_isApproved = 0 and nuclear_draft_isApproved = 1 order by orderBy

SELECT
FROM tb_official_document WHERE issued_eid = #{eid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and (issued_isApproved = 1 or issued_isApproved = -1) order by orderBy

update tb_official_document
draft_eid = #{draftEid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fid = #{fid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nuclear_draft_eid = #{nuclearDraftEid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nuclear_draft_isApproved = #{nuclearDraftIsapproved,jdbcType=INTEGER},
nuclear_draft_opinion = #{nuclearDraftOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
issued_eid = #{issuedEid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

issued_opinion = #{issuedOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
orderBy = #{orderby,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updatetime = now(),
where odid = #{odid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tb_official_document set draft_eid = #{draftEid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fid = #{fid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nuclear_draft_eid = #{nuclearDraftEid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nuclear_draft_isApproved = #{nuclearDraftIsapproved,jdbcType=INTEGER}, nuclear_draft_opinion = #{nuclearDraftOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, issued_eid = #{issuedEid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, issued_isApproved = #{issuedIsapproved,jdbcType=INTEGER}, issued_opinion = #{issuedOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, orderBy = #{orderby,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updatetime = now() where odid = #{odid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tb_official_document set nuclear_draft_isApproved = #{nuclearDraftIsapproved,jdbcType=INTEGER}, nuclear_draft_opinion = #{nuclearDraftOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updatetime = now() where odid = #{odid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and nuclear_draft_eid = #{nuclearDraftEid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tb_official_document set issued_isApproved = #{issuedIsapproved,jdbcType=INTEGER}, issued_opinion = #{issuedOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updatetime = now() where odid = #{odid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and issued_eid = #{issuedEid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
